 I have plenty of files of someone over there saying my whole name, and I m=
ean first middle and last name, and in reverse as well, these folks over th=
ere are still living!=C2=A0 sf

 



-----Original Message-----
From: Adria=
na Jones <adrianamjones@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: =
Mon, Jan 24, 2011 4:47 pm
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 10-4

          =C2=A0    =
                              Frank, I realize how this sounds, but it's no=
t debunker fodder.  They truly have said 10-4, and more than once.  And thi=
s doesn't invalidate ANYTHING.  I know for a FACT, Frank, that these voices=
 are truly anomalous, based on a precise validation method I started using =
which looks at the length of the messages.  They not only 10-4 but they say=
 everything else under the sun, which has nothing to do with police scanner=
s or anything of that sort.  And a lot of it I've validated to be without a=
 doubt anomalous, based on the message length... I think they may like to u=
se ten-code... that's my suspicion... and I'd like to see if I'm right.  Al=
so I've made two compilation sound files each lasting 20 some seconds long,=
 which are compilations of all the "help me"s I've received from a 5 minute=
 and a 7 minute session.  Debunk that, debunkers! I feel that what we get a=
cross these ghost boxes is yes, ghosts, but also so much more than that.  I=
 don't know what, and it's   painful not knowing, but based on the VARIETY =
of messages I've received, it's just amazing, it's absolutely amazing,and I=
 don't know what it is...
 
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefr=
iend" <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
 >
 >  That's debunker fodde=
r! Some claim we just hear snippets of radio broadcasts along with CB radio=
. You can get harmonics, espcially if someone in the area is running an ill=
egal amplifier. There can also be some mixing of signals under certain cond=
itions, mixing combines combines signals, resulting in different frequency =
products. I am not saying that is what this radio jargon is, it might be an=
 indication "they" are using some form of transmission, and trying to indic=
ate it. 
 > 
 >  When I do those test vidoes, the cellphone announces=
 "Look here" when it starts, and the radios pick that up. I'd listen for co=
ntent, and personal messages, and ignore anything that seems unrelated to q=
uestions, or spirit contact. It can get really confusing. Some take every w=
ord as meanigful, even the ones that are clearly a sports annoucer, or car =
salesman. The Jesus broascasts that are so common in this country can add a=
 layer of confusion.
 > 
 >  F-S
 > 
 > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com, "Adriana Jones" <adrianamjones@> wrote:
 > >
 > &gt=
; I've heard 10-4 across my ghost box a couple of times. I'm going to start=
 using
 > > radio code to see if they respond. If anyone else wants t=
o do this, please let
 > > me know what results you get.
 > > 
=
 > > Thanks.
 > > 
 > > Adriana.
 > >
 >
 
 
   =

t middle and last name, and in reverse as well, these folks over there are =
still living!  sf<br>
</div>

</div>

<div>Frank, I realize how this sounds, but it's not debunke=
r fodder.  They truly have said 10-4, and more than once.  And this doesn't=
 invalidate ANYTHING.  I know for a FACT, Frank, that these voices are trul=
y anomalous, based on a precise validation method I started using which loo=
ks at the length of the messages.  They not only 10-4 but they say everythi=
ng else under the sun, which has nothing to do with police scanners or anyt=
hing of that sort.  And a lot of it I've validated to be without a doubt an=
omalous, based on the message length... I think they may like to use ten-co=
de... that's my suspicion... and I'd like to see if I'm right.  Also I've m=
ade two compilation sound files each lasting 20 some seconds long, which ar=
e compilations of all the "help me"s I've received from a 5 minute and a 7 =
minute session.  Debunk that, debunkers! I feel that what we get across the=
se ghost boxes is yes, ghosts, but also so much more than that.  I don't kn=
ow what, and it's   painful not knowing, but based on the VARIETY of messag=
es I've received, it's just amazing, it's absolutely amazing,and I don't kn=
ow what it is...<br>
 <br>
